Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate a sink in the bathroom.', '2. Fill the sink with water and add soap.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        # Select the bathroom
        foreach sink: item:
            if is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, bathroom) and not visited(sink):
                observe(sink, "Confirm it is a sink in the bathroom")
                # Check for the presence of a sink and ensure its in the bathroom
                achieve visited(sink)
                # Mark the sink as visited to avoid rechecking
